RelatedSentence: LAHORE : Punjab Chief Minister Shahbaz Sharif on Sunday announced Rs 5 billion ' Ramazan Package ' to provide essential items to masses at cheaper rates during the holy month of Ramazan .
LAHORE : Punjab Chief Minister Shahbaz Sharif on Sunday announced Rs 5 billion ' Ramazan Package ' to provide essential items to masses at cheaper rates during the holy month of Ramazan .

The chief minister told a meeting held to review the Ramazan Package that effective monitoring of Ramazan bazaars will be ensured for easy availability of quality items at cheaper rates and provincial ministers , elected representatives , secretaries , commissioners and district coordination officers will perform duties in this regard .
He said that nine provincial ministers and local assembly members of nine divisions of the province will perform their responsibilities in this regard on permanent basis .
He said that nine provincial ministers and local assembly members of nine divisions of the province will perform their responsibilities in this regard on permanent basis .
The chief minister said that provincial cabinet committee can use his aircraft and helicopter for visiting far - flung areas .
The chief minister said that provincial cabinet committee can use his aircraft and helicopter for visiting far - flung areas .
The chief minister said that no compromise will be made on the quality of vegetables , fruits and essential items being sold in Ramazan bazaars .
He said political and administrative machinery will play an active role to ensure supply of quality items in abundance so that people could fully benefit from the Ramazan Package .
